messages.title: My local issues are
messages.content: Increase the old age pension to £130 per week per pensioner and £260 for a couple. Make Herefordshire hospital car parks free for patients and their visitors. The charges are a tax on illness.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase the old age pension to £130 per week per pensioner and £260 for a couple.
Make Herefordshire hospital car parks free for patients and their visitors.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Herefordshire is fast becoming 'The Forgotten County.

issues.brexitEurope: I will ban the 'illness tax''car parking charges at Herefordshire hospitals. I will call for an immediate, tactical, withdrawal from Afghanistan.
issues.health: Make Herefordshire hospital car parks free for patients and their visitors. The charges are a tax on illness.
issues.socialWelfare: Increase the old age pension to £130 per week per pensioner and £260 for a couple.

images.caption: Jonathan Oakton election communication for the UK Independence Party
